experience.description: Conducted research in unsteady thermo-fluid dynamics, utilizing advanced fluid simulation tools and high-performance computing systems. Developed expertise in numerical simulation and software optimization, with responsibilities including solver maintenance and debugging. The PhD was interrupted to pursue interests in machine learning, computer vision, creative AI, and software security.

Performed combustion analysis by applying the LES AVBP calculation code to experimental databases. Compared experimental results with three-dimensional simulations to improve tool accuracy and identified design strategies to reduce emissions while maintaining performance. Gained practical experience in combustion engineering at Safran, a leading aerospace propulsion company.

Developed Python tools and GT Suite workflows to automate data pipelines for simulation analysis. Created scripts for data extraction, processing, and visualization, enhancing workflow efficiency. Integrated automation into GT Suite environments, significantly reducing manual post-processing time.

Conducted research on combustion modeling and uncertainty quantification in multiphase flow systems, applying Monte Carlo stochastic methods to study combustion and quantify uncertainties. Developed and optimized in-house Fortran and C solver components to improve numerical robustness, and automated data pipelines and simulation control using Python and Bash scripts in Linux environments.

experience.company: EPTA (Equipe de Propulsão e Tecnologia Aeroespacial)
experience.description: Developed a neural network algorithm using Tensorflow and Pytorch to predict aerodynamic coefficients for a reduced-scale rocket prototype. Managed fundraising initiatives, including visual identity design, game development, and Python education. Integrated predictive models into the team's flight simulator to improve trajectory control and supervised the aerodynamics sub-team, overseeing testing, modeling, and validation activities.

poem_orlando.title: Pray for Orlando
poem_orlando.text:
Sou um ET
De um mundo plano.
Venho de um tempo
Distante desse ano.

Andava pelas ruas,
Estavam asfaltadas.
Olhando para o céu
Eu só via a fumaça.
E via homens agindo como máquinas.

Vi um homem estuprando,
Um matando negros e índios,
Uma mulher com olho roxo
Chorando escondido.
Tudo continua tão normal.

Mas de repente,
Algo incomodou.
Algo que ninguém jamais me perguntou.

Vi dois homens se beijando,
Que horror!
Queime na fogueira
Ou atire, por favor.

50 mortos
53 feridos

Olha o Bolsonaro,
Um alívio para a família.
Antes filho morto,
Do que gay.

Porque de onde eu venho,
Isso sim que é castigo.
Esses homens pervertidos.
O amor está perdido.
Mas eu não,
Pois eu sou dono da razão.
poem_orlando.context: Written in response to the 2016 Pulse nightclub shooting in Orlando, Florida. The poem reflects on societal prejudices and the tragedy that claimed 49 lives and injured 53 others. Through irony, it critiques discrimination and violence against the LGBTQ+ community.
